title: Riot Don't care about their game, that is facts
body:
Pretty much just thought I'd pop a notice here hoping that it helps Riot realize how bad the game actually is, 25 games in a row of abusive behavior or in game trolling. I told myself at 25 games I am going to forfeit my account. 

- The game has too much damage which takes away the brain aspect
-The community is more toxic than ever
-And the Support staff member AYAME, for their horrible Support Service

thats my 2 cents', I can see this game dying this year

replies.body: Thought the same way until i woke up and noticed its pre-season and looking at the patch 9.2 im excited as ever to get to masters-challenger
